::Crater::

Crater looks up and listens to Dragonfly. He nods, covering his 
optics from the sun.

"Yeah, we can speak," he yells loudly enough for Dragonfly to 
hear, "I was heading toward a base I detected, I want to join that 
faction."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Blacknightmare/Dragonfly:
> 
> Blacknightmare was working in her office when main computer advice 
to

>

now"
>

used 
> his comm link and told Blacknightmare "I'll give him an apropiate 
> welcome...  " 
> 
> "Hey you!!!!" screamed Dragonfly while he flew few feet over
